definitions.definition: A short, heavy club, often of wood, which is thicker or loaded at one end.
definitions.example: We smashed the radio with a steel bludgeon.

definitions.definition: To strike or hit with something hard, usually on the head; to club.
definitions.example: The apprehended rioter was bludgeoned to death.

definitions.definition: To coerce someone, as if with a bludgeon.
definitions.example: Their favorite method was bludgeoning us with the same old arguments in favor of their opinions.
